roleset.name: (make) become stiff

example.name: passive with cause
example.text: [The Pathet Lao]-2, [*-2]-3 stiffened [*-3] by Communist Veterans fromneighboring North Viet Nam, were supplied by Soviet aircraft.
example.arg: by Communist Veterans from neighboring North Viet Nam

example.name: unaccusative
example.text: When-3 the cloth dried and stiffened [*T*-3], he saw whatadjustments had to be made.

roleset.note: Based on WSJ. Member of VNcls other_cos-45.4.
